resources.string: Tap your card to open to the safe
Your matriculation card Info will be shown here.
Warning:\n Please use this app at your own risks\n The dev is not responsible for any consequences directly or indirectly resulted from using this app
Developed by Zhu Liang for personal uses only
Cards with confirmed support:\n NUS Matric Card, DBS Debit Card, OCBC Debit Card
Passwords/PINs to link with this card
